I'm experiencing some strange behavior from NEAT, I've rewritten the Double=
 Pole Without Velocities and with Damping recently using another language, =
and plugged it back in. 

After running the experiment many times, every on=
ce in a rare while NEAT manages to solve the Double Pole Balancing without =
velocities and with Damping experiment using 1 Neuron. Is the 1 Neuron solu=
tion possible, or have I made a mistake somewhere while rewriting the exper=
iment.
